scripts.build:ci: cd frontend && VITE_API_BASE_URL=https://dummy.api.com VITE_MAPBOX_TOKEN=dummy_token npm run build
scripts.setup:local: echo 'Setting up local development environment...' && echo '1. Install Wrangler CLI: npm install -g wrangler' && echo '2. Start Cloudflare Pages locally: wrangler pages dev frontend --local' && echo '3. Copy .env.example to .env and fill in local values' && echo '4. Run migrations: wrangler d1 execute farmers-boot-local --file=schema.sql' && echo '5. Run: npm run dev:local'
scripts.db:studio: wrangler d1 execute farmers-boot-local --command='SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type="table";'
